room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: I went with my mom, my brother, and his girlfriend, and we were the only four to tackle the "Runaway Train" room. The room itself was very cleverly designed and the puzzles difficult but rewarding. The building was very clean and comfortable, the check in process smooth and easy, and the service very friendly and enthusiastic. I'm just now getting into escape rooms but I'll definitely be back here to feed my budding addiction.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: The clues were challenging but it was nice that you could get clues and not be penalized. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We had 6 people in our group. I think 4 would have been a perfect number. My group really enjoyed it! No extra money for the picture at the end was a nice bonus.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: We played the Runaway Train and enjoyed the whole train feel and sound effects! There were many clever puzzles to solve!

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: I went with a group of friends and had a great time! Mark was awesome and really made the experience memorable

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: So much fun! Our team from work did this as team building and we had a blast. The room was super nice and you felt like you were actually in a train car. I will be returning to check out their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: Absolutely awesome. Our group did the Runaway Train and the Mystery Mansion. We had tons of fun. Christian and Alexander were amazing!
